column5: I hope everyone has a great day, Christmas Eve was wonderful and tomorrow will be even better. Happy Holidays all!!
Give Santa's helper a hug for me Bud !!  Hope it's the bestest Christmas since the last one TJ !
Merry Christmas TJ !
And a Merry Christmas to you & yours too TJ.  All the best in the New Year.
Merry Christmas everyone the kids just got done with there gifts and i finished setting up Mikey's race track time to play.
merry christmas!  my 4 year old just finished opening all his presents and the day will be filled with playing with toys, ice skating and food!!!  (maybe a pop or 2 as well)  cheers!
Merry Christmas everyone.
Merry Christmas everyone !!
Merry Christmas to all the OFC'ers today.  We are anxiously awaiting our son and wife with our grand kids. ( little guy is sick )
Merry Christmas !

Ho, ho, ho, now that part is over, time to set the table, no turkey,  decided it's going to be a fondue day.  The only bad thing about that, the wife  gets cranky when I use 3 forks, 1 fresh meat, 2 cooking and 3 almost done never mind this 1 at a time thing..takes forever to get fed.
Merry Christmas to all and thanks for another great year of friends.   Art
Merry Christmas Boss - and to all my friends on OFC (whether we've met or not).   Merry Christmas everyone.

Yes, Merry Christmas to all on OFC. I am going to my sister's place for Christmas dinner(i am sure I will be bloated when I leave there, LOL), then back home to pack for ice fishing tomorrow.  I went to boxing day sales for the first time last year.  NEVER, NEVER, NEVER, AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!! That was freaking nutz. I will take the solitude of ice fishing, in -C weather, wind going sideways, snow going sideways, freezing my whatever off, and catching squat over that experience.
Merry Christmas to all. Off to moms in a few minutes to enjoy the day with all my family.  Heading out on Nip tomorrow to check things out.
Merry Christmas Everyone.  Paul and I opened our gifts, now I'm off to pick up my son, mom and we're all heading up to my sisters for Christmas dinner and more presents  Joey
Last night was a blast, this morning even better for these two, and us all.  Hope you and yours are having an awesome Holiday Season.  Merry Ho Ho OFC'ers.
Merry Christmas to you and your family as well!
Merry Christmas Boss.. as well as everyone else here on OFC.  Great picture Drew!
Happy Christmas, Merry New Year! Wishing everyone on OFC a SAFE and Healthy 2011!
Merry Christmas to all. Extra special this Year A new addition Dec 23, daughter had a baby boy,our second grandchild this year.
Merry Christmas to all. Extra special this Year A new addition Dec 23, daughter had a baby boy,our second grandchild this year.
Merry christmas all Grandkids all done opening gifts ,turkey in oven Now time for a nap and dream of creekman{Mike}
Merry Xmas to the entire OFC Gang!!!
Merry Christmas Everyone!!!!   :santa:  Hope Santa was good to you all!
